page.title: 14LANGUAGE
page.content: {LANGUAGE 1985} IN 1985 SOME WORDS HAVE TAKEN A DIFFERENT MEANING IN EVERY DAY USAGE. HERE ARE SOME THAT ARE PART OF AN ELEVEN YEAR OLD'S VOCABULARY.{ {WORD DICTIONARY 1985 USUAGE BIRD ANIMAL WITH PRETTY GIRL FEATHERS BOTTLE GLASS CONTAINER COURAGE BREAD FOOD MADE FROM MONEY FLOUR AND BAKED CHICKEN BIRD KEPT TO PERSON WHO PROVIDE EGGS & IS COWARDLY MEAT COOL NOT HOT SLIGHTLY IN FASHION COLD DOUGH FLOUR MOISTENED MONEY AND KNEADED HAIRY COVERED WITH HAIR DANGEROUS HEAVY OF GREAT WEIGHT HARD TO ACCEPT.
